summary: It seemed perfect - a new house, a new marriage, a child soon to be born. But when Sarah and Matt invite their friends to celebrate, the situation turns deadly as they enter a burned-out prison on a ghost hunt.
cast: Chelsey Crisp|Riley Smith|Michael Steger|Lyndon Smith|Brittany Ishibashi|Elimu Nelson|David Yow|Eric Abraham|Denny Ainsworth|Ben Amick|Brook Amos|Mark Ashworth|Sandra Bowman|Bailey Campbell|Fran Capitanelli|Kyla Deaver|Bill Eudaly|Anna House|Tom Jersawitz|Raj Kala|Robert Kelly|Charles Lawlor|Marilyn Light|Bryan Malone|Joshua Mikel|Devin Marcus Miller|Shannon Mulvaney|Alan Richmond|Matt Rossitch|William Tokarsky|Izzy Watts

title: Bleed
